analyzed: jātaka  eka ka nipāta  kulāvaka vagga
translated: The Jātaka🔽The Collection of Long Discourses
The Chapter on the Empty Homestead🔽The Bird Jātaka

analyzed: yam nissitā jagati ruham vihaṅgamā  svāyam aggim pamuñcati
translated: “The birds that depend on the tree of the world🔽now set fire to it.
You must fly in all directions, you with the crooked neck;
danger has arisen for those who take refuge.”
The Bird Jātaka is the sixth.
